body: looooooool this is soooo embarrassing hahahahahaha
it's the secondhand embarrassment for me. Dude Just straight up peeked AAHAHAHAHAH

@trueninelives I can't tell the exact content of the exchange but at some point the man accuses one thinking this could be a rape case and then the other guy steps up and states his love and consent. What I would consider a cute moment if it wasn't because I kept being bothered by this other man barging in on their moment in the first place XD

I'm into yaoi but the kind of "it's a girl with a dick, but ultimately a girl" yaoi type. So I usually avoid the true male x true male yaoi. But this two are lovely and before all I'm a fan of good chemistry between the leads in a romance, beyond if it appeals my fetishes or not, so this has my approval and will go to my "maybe I will fap to it" list XD

This author's pairing is super cute and hot.
